caption.center: In the Matter of GEORGE W. VIVINO, a Suspended Attorney.

court.center: Appellate Division of the Supreme Court of New York, First Department.

opinion.opinion_text:
Petitioner's motion is granted, and petitioner shall be reinstated as an attorney and counselor-at-law upon his submission of written proof that he has attended and completed a recognized New York Bar Review course and upon the further order of this Court. No opinion.
Concur â€” Murphy, P.J., Rosenberger, Kupferman and Asch, JJ.
